record.alternateTitle1: Albert Pick Hall for International Studies
record.creatorArchitect2: Burnham and Hammond Inc. and J. Lee Jones
record.description: View from the southeast corner of Walker, looking towards the northeast, over the roof of the Oriental Institute toward the chapel and tower of the [Chicago Theological Seminary]. Photography contest, First Prize.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Caption written on the sleeve of the negative. No photo included. Original must be missing.
